description: Try our easy to follow Strawberry-Vanilla Gin & Tonic recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Strawberry-Vanilla Gin & Tonic Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Combine 8 chopped strawberries, 4 torn basil leaves, 1 tbs lime juice and 1/4 tsp vanilla bean paste in a jug or cocktail shaker. Mash using a muddler or fork. Add 1/4 cup gin and shake well. Fill glasses with crushed ice and strain over mixture. Top up each with 1/3 cup tonic water. Serve immediately.
